about_the_game:
This is just a little preview of what's to come. The final game will include:

  • Adorable customers: Forge friendships and learn about their favourite recipes and decorations.

  • Learn new recipes... To the beat! Prepare snacks and drinks, from waffles to sodas, to the rhythm of upbeat tunes and colourful animations.

  • Unleash your creativity! Practice your skills whenever you like. Experiment with new ingredient combinations and sell them in your own vending machine to earn rewards!

  • Manage your own cafeteria: Customize your place with furniture, decorations, lamps, wallpaper, and flooring. Take pictures of your favourite corners, dishes, and customers and share them on the café's website.

  • Pick up your customer's hobbies! Learn your customers' favourite crafts. Flower arranging, friendship bracelets, slime... and more!
detailed_description:
This is just a little preview of what's to come. The final game will include:

  • Adorable customers: Forge friendships and learn about their favourite recipes and decorations.

  • Learn new recipes... To the beat! Prepare snacks and drinks, from waffles to sodas, to the rhythm of upbeat tunes and colourful animations.

  • Unleash your creativity! Practice your skills whenever you like. Experiment with new ingredient combinations and sell them in your own vending machine to earn rewards!

  • Manage your own cafeteria: Customize your place with furniture, decorations, lamps, wallpaper, and flooring. Take pictures of your favourite corners, dishes, and customers and share them on the café's website.

  • Pick up your customer's hobbies! Learn your customers' favourite crafts. Flower arranging, friendship bracelets, slime... and more!
legal_notice: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café © 2023 Anaïs Salla

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café is a cozy decoration game where you cook to the beat and unleash your creativity!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Catalan, French, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
